meanings.definition: The action of marking one's pleasure at an important event or occasion by engaging in enjoyable activities.
meanings.sent1: The whole town gathered for a joyful celebration of the new year.
meanings.sent2: We had a big celebration for my birthday with cake and balloons.
meanings.sent3: The celebration turned into a dance-off competition, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a celebration of happiness that lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful decorations made the celebration feel like a magical dream.

meanings.definition: An event or party to mark a special occasion.
meanings.sent1: The school organized a fun celebration for the end of the year.
meanings.sent2: The wedding celebration was filled with love and laughter.
meanings.sent3: The celebration had a surprise guest appearance by a famous singer.
meanings.sent4: The city lights at night created a celebration of twinkling stars.
meanings.sent5: The grand fireworks display made the celebration unforgettable.
